title: Trump Threatens to Reveal Unflattering Information About DeSantis if He Runs
description: “I know more about him than anybody other than perhaps his wife,” the former president reportedly said.
dc:creator: Maggie Haberman
media:credit: Scott McIntyre for The New York Times
media:description: Gov. Ron DeSantis of Florida spoke at a rally in Hialeah, Fla., on Monday.
